hidden_gems.snippet: vibes are forever stuck in the 19th century here. berenicegohel / Atlas Obscura User Welcome to one of Barcelona’s most atmospheric bars. berenicegohel / Atlas Obscura User There are quirky details every which way you look here.

general.title: Barcelona travel
general.snippet: verview Founded over 2000 years ago as Roman Barcino, Catalonia’s capital is one of Europe’s most desirable cities – a sunny, Mediterranean-hugging hub that breezily combines its rich cultural traditions with a forward-thinking, environmentally aware attitude. During Barcelona’s medieval Golden Age,

general.title: Barcelona vs Madrid: Which Spanish city should you visit?
general.snippet: sabella Noble champions Barcelona's Mediterranean beauty with golden beaches, while Natalia Diaz makes the case for Madrid's world-class art, cultural treasures and historic sites. Both are magnificent, with distinct appeal. Which Spanish giant would you choose?

general.title: Is Barcelona expensive for travelers?
general.snippet: a thriving nightlife and incredible attractions. It's no wonder visitors flock here every year without fail and one visit is never enough. However, all these wonderful things to see and do bring a downside – budget-busting prices.

general.title: Spain travel
general.snippet: From Madrid to Barcelona , discover flamenco rhythms, sun-drenched beaches, tapas culture and more in our Spain travel guide. Find top attractions and tips.
